response.original_title: Fur for film vol.1 I don't own a cat by Tzuan Wu & Erica Sheu
response.overview: The cat I don't own runs through windows between different spaces and times, and it disappears before finishing a sentence.  Using outtakes and rushes (what "fur film" means in Mandarin) to redeem the affects in these images we produced for. The film is the first volume of an ongoing exchange diary project between Erica SHEU and Tzuan WU. From the filming exercises and hand processing from the very beginning, we collaborate and experiment with different workflows of audio and visual between Taiwan and USA.
response.title: Fur for film vol.1 I don't own a cat by Tzuan Wu & Erica Sheu
